required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Conservative Management of CIN2 Lesions and Biomarkers Evaluation
clinical_study.official_title: Gestione Conservativa di Lesioni CIN2 e Valutazione di Biomarcatori Indicativi di Regressione

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective study including women aged 25-45 years, adherent to the cervical screening program of four different centers of the Veneto region, with a diagnosis of CIN2 lesion. After enrollment according to predefined criteria, and informed consent to participate, the CIN2 lesions are managed by follow-up; cases with progressive lesions will be treated immediately, cases with CIN2 persistence for more than 12 months will be treated as well. Viral, molecular and immunocytochemical biomarkers will be studied, and evaluated in relation to the clinical outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of spontaneous regression of CIN2 lesions
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 years.
primary_outcome.description: Eligible women will not be treated at diagnosis, but periodically followed-up. Treatment will be provided for progressive lesions and lesions persisting more than 12 months. The rates of lesion regression will be calculated: number of lesions regressed to CIN1 or normal / total number of cases.

primary_outcome.measure: CIN2 clinical outcome by HPV genotype
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 years.
primary_outcome.description: Rate of CIN2 regression will be calculated in relation to positivity for HPV16 vs positivity for other high-risk types (number of regressed HPV16-related CIN2 lesions / total number of HPV16-related CIN2 vs number of regressed non-HPV16-related CIN2 lesions / total number of non-HPV16-related CIN2 lesions).

primary_outcome.measure: CIN2 clinical outcome by DNA methylation
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 years.
primary_outcome.description: Rate of CIN2 regression will be calculated in relation to DNA methylation of cellular and viral genes (number of regressed hypermethylated CIN2 lesions / total number of CIN2 lesions with valid result for each gene analyzed).

primary_outcome.measure: CIN2 clinical outcome by p16/ki67 protein expression
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 years.
primary_outcome.description: Rate of CIN2 regression will be calculated in relation to positivity for p16/ki67 expression (number of regressed p16/ki67-positive CIN2 lesions / total number of CIN2 lesions with valid result for p16/ki67 expression).

secondary_outcome.description: The rate of eligible women consenting to participate to the study will be calculated (enrolled women / eligible women)

biospec_descr.textblock: Cervical cells and DNA extracted therefrom to be used for biomarkers analyses, retained for the duration of the study.

study_pop.textblock: Women attending organized population-based cervical cancer screening with a histological CIN2 lesion, meeting the selection criteria and consenting to participate.

eligibility.gender_description: The study is related to a disease of the female genital tract.
